parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all alive and dead entities of the given type or deriving from the given type. Units in vehicles are ignored. When empty string "" is passed for the type, all entity types are returned.<br><br>
Alternative syntax introduced in Arma 3 v1.65.138685 allows to filter entities by type and alive status as well as to return entities currently in vehicles.<br><br>
'''Optimisation tip''': Keep number of types in both ''includeTypes'' and ''excludeTypes'' arrays to a minimum by possibly using parent/base classes. If you have to use several types, arrange them in order so that the more common types go at the beginning of the array. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[entities]] type </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> type: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[entities]] [typesInclude, typesExclude, includeCrews, excludeDead]&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;''since Arma 3 v1.65.138685'' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [typesInclude, typesExclude, includeCrews, excludeDead]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> typesInclude: [[Array]] - in format [type1, type2, ...typeN], where type is a [[String]]. Empty array [] means include every entity. Method used for filtering - [[isKindOf]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value>  typesExclude: [[Array]] - in format [type1, type2, ...typeN], where type is a [[String]]. Empty array [] means exclude no entity. Method used for filtering - [[isKindOf]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> includeCrews (Optional): [[Boolean]] - include crews currently in vehicles. Default: [[false]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> excludeDead (Optional): [[Boolean]] - exclude dead entities. Default: [[false]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER25</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allcars = [[entities]] "Car";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Return all alive entities on the map:<code>_allalive = [[entities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], [], [[true]], [[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Return dead and alive entities but logic:<code>_notlogic = [[entities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], ["Logic"], [[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Return all alive [[west]] soldiers on foot:<code>_footsoldiers = [[entities]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["SoldierWB"], [], [[false]], [[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[nearEntities]], [[allUnits]], [[vehicles]], [[agents]], [[allMissionObjects]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
